attributes.action: Ban Halal meat in the UK
attributes.background: Prevent animals dying in pain by being bled out while they are still alive... In the UK and may other contries that are none Halal we kill the animal first then bleed it out so there is no discomfort

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104590
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
